item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Hi, I’m Van Toan (vtoan)! I’m working as a software engineer, here are some projects I’ve contributed to: Develop Human-Machine-Interface (HMI) for Cluster using Kanzi with Thundersoft, 2023 - present Work on Kanzi to build graphical user interfaces (GUIs) for Cluster screens. Manipulate 2D/3D assets to create graphic effects and animations; and handle user interactions with C++. Draw graphic elements using OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL). Core skills: Understanding of computer graphic processing/ graphic pipeline.
